TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. It's old, moldy, and more sludge than fruit.

I wish for a new computer.

Granted. It's new:

I wish the police did its job.

Granted. You get fined three times in one day for jaywalking, speeding just over the limit, and parking an inch too far from the curb.

I wish I had a billion dollars.

Granted. Zimbabwe Dollars.

I wish I had a googol. Of, well, anything really, as long as it's not on top of me or about to fall on top of me.

Granted. You now have a googol of festering sores.

I wish for an affordable, safe flying car.

Granted. Everyone else has one too, including the morons. Have fun dodging them!

I wish NASA had a decent, cheap SSTO.

Granted. It has safety reliability of 0.0 percent. Because it only exists in your imagination

I wish for a Nasa badge.

Granted, but you have to join NASA and complete all the astronaut training to get it.

I wish for the day off.

Granted. But overtime does not count because modern rules. (So you end up working the whole day regardless, just with no pay!)

I wish to never have to work and never be in need of money (Not being homeless or anything)

Granted, u're nothing (hey u asked for it!)

I wish for cheese.

Granted. You get 6-pooled playing StarCraft II.

I wish to be Mayer Amsel Rotschild.

Granted. You ruin all of the things she's going to do because you're you.

I wish for rendering to be harder than video recording.

Granted, but it's so difficult you give up before you can produce anything.

I wish I had a pet dragon.

Granted. You get mind controlled by the dragon, once it's old enough (~2 yrs). You feed it as much dragon food as you can afford and go broke.

I wish to know what the bottom of the sky looks like.

Granted. Your mind rebels at what it sees and you go insane.

I wish I weren't afraid of heights.

Granted, but you're afraid of low altitudes now.

I wish for more time.

Granted, but you won't live as long now.

I wish for a technician monkey.

Granted.

I wish for an armada.

Granted. It is the Spanish one, and it's currently fighting some British ships...

I wish for a dark green rep bar.

Granted.But you posted a provocational post and earned 2 dark red rep bars!

I wish Cake was not the lie.

Granted. GLaDOS poisons the cake.

I wish for a copy of Majora's Mask 3D.

Granted, You dont have any console to play, and the game is a Japanese version.

I wish for some good rep.

Granted, but it is not I that gives you some. (Sneaky, sneaky!)

I wish for $10000.

Granted. You get $10000, but it's from a loan at 50% APR interest.

I wish to be independently wealthy. (Edit: That is some fine, fine corruption below. )

Edited February 10, 2015 by Red Iron Crown

Granted. Though it won't last for long - your now ex-wife has paid the best divorce lawyer in the country to sue you for the money.

I wish that I could kill anyone without getting framed or otherwise prosecuted for it.
